moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user's Defense stat.
